turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello friend, Would you mind ordering a coffee for pick up from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'd be happy to do that for you! Are you referring to the Starbucks store on Wooster Road?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! What can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to have the Iced Peppermint White Chocolate Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, that'll be a grande Iced Peppermint White Chocolate Mocha with whole milk and whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like this to be paid with your account?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your order will be ready to pick up shortly at Starbucks on Wooster Road

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And a confirmation will be sent to you via text message
